Display humidity with bar LED

dev board WeMos D1 Mini
chip ESP8266
chip 74HC595
chip Si7021
sensor humidity
features bar LED shift register

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • ESP8266 Arduino
  • Adafruit DHT-sensor-library

Buy the components

  1. WeMos D1 Mini
  2. Adafruit Si7021 breakout board
  3. BAR LED dip package
  4. 74HC595 8-Bit Shift Register DIP-16 IC

Code

Download code display-humidity-bar-led.ino

Makefile

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

Display humidity with sensor Si7021 in a bar graph LED display via a 74HC595 shift register.

References

  1. DHT-sensor-library
